virtues.comment: THIS DICT DOES NOTHING - it's purely here for quick reference of some possible virtues, you are not constrained to using these nor should you use these lists
prev_lead_virtues: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

text: m_c leaves to speak with StarClan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/close/closes} {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes and {VERB/m_c/are/is} immediately surrounded by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} loved ones, friends, and Clanmates who have passed on. Stars shine throughout their pelts, and their eyes are warm as they greet the new leader.

As m_c dreams that night, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/find/finds} {PRONOUN/m_c/self} walking the stars of Silverpelt, a ghostly landscape surrounding {PRONOUN/m_c/object} and a single, starry cat sat within a clearing.

m_c leaves to speak with StarClan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/close/closes} {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes and {VERB/m_c/awaken/awakens} under a vast, inky black sky. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/turn/turns} around to see a wary group of cats approaching, stars dotting their fur.

life_giving.text: The starry cat approaches {PRONOUN/m_c/object} and, although the cat is unfamiliar, their meeting still feels like a reunion with an old friend. "My name is r_c. You meet me tonight, but the cats under your care will all meet me one day when they join the stars. For now," the cat presses {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nose to m_c's forehead, "Take this gift, to help you [virtue]."
virtue: endure in the face of hardship
know when to fight and when to choose peace
have the strength to overcome your fears
see the dawn behind the darkness

life_giving.text: Suddenly, the mist at the edge of the clearing takes shape. Dozens of wispy, starry spirits emerge, quickly surrounding m_c. "We grant you your remaining [life_num] lives."  Individually, each voice is distant, but together, the force of their words shakes m_c to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} core.  "Use them well, with our blessing."  And in a heartbeat, they were gone.
r_c pads up to the new leader, softly touching {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nose to m_c's head. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a life for [virtue].

m_c is breathless when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/see/sees} r_c approach. Fierce pride burns in r_c's eyes as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/greet/greets} {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} child, pressing {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nose to m_c's forehead and giving {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a life for [virtue].
virtue: courage in the face of hardship

life_giving.text: It feels like a dream when r_c emerges from the star-filled crowd. m_c can barely stand {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ground, resisting the temptation to run forward and press into {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kit's fur. Love shines in r_c's eyes as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a life for [virtue].
virtue: courage in the face of hardship

life_giving.text: r_c stalks up to the new leader, eyes burning with unexpected ferocity. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/touch/touches} {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nose to m_c's head, giving {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a life for [virtue]. m_c reels back with the emotion of the life that courses through {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
r_c walks up to m_c, offering a life for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/smile/smiles}, and {VERB/r_c/state/states} that the Clan will do well under m_c's leadership.
r_c steps forward to give m_c a life for [virtue]. m_c grits {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} teeth as the life rushes into {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

r_c dips {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} head in greeting. Energy surges through m_c's pelt as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/receive/receives} a life for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/reassure/reassures} m_c that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/are/is} almost done.

r_c walks up to m_c, giving {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a life for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/pause/pauses}, then {VERB/r_c/shake/shakes} {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} head, heading back into the ranks of StarClan.
A new cat approaches. r_c steps forward to give m_c a life for [virtue]. m_c yowls in pain as the life rushes into {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
r_c approaches. Pain surges through m_c's pelt as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} receive a life for [virtue]. r_c watches dispassionately.'

r_c bounds up to the new leader, reaching up on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} hind legs to give {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a new life for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/flick/flicks} {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} tail and {VERB/r_c/head/heads} back to make room for the next cat.

A tiny kit, r_c, runs up to m_c, stars twinkling in {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} eyes. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} loudly and theatrically {VERB/r_c/proclaim/proclaims} that {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}'ll be giving m_c a life for [virtue] before dashing back into line, looking very proud of {PRONOUN/r_c/self}.

Emerging from the line comes r_c, a quiet calm to {PRONOUN/r_c/object} despite {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} small stature. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} very carefully {VERB/r_c/offer/offers} a life for [virtue], sounding as though {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} trying very hard to remember the right words to say. Once finished, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/rush/rushes} back to the line of starry pelts.

r_c nearly sprints out of the crowd, caught last moment by an older StarClan cat who gives a sharp, but endeared, whisper before setting {PRONOUN/r_c/object} back down. r_c continues towards m_c, but slower this time, barely containing {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} excitement. When {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a life for [virtue], {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/press/presses} {PRONOUN/r_c/self} tightly against m_c's legs before returning to the ranks of StarClan.

r_c hesitantly approaches the new leader, reaching up on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} hind legs to give {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a new life for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/lash/lashes} {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} tail and {VERB/r_c/head/heads} back to make room for the next cat.
A young cat emerges from the starry ranks to give a life. Starlight reflects off {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} youthful eyes. r_c stretches up to give a life for [virtue].

A young cat emerges from the starry ranks to give a life. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/hesitate/hesitates}, before an older cat nudges {PRONOUN/r_c/object} forward, whispering something in {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} ear. r_c stretches up to give a life for [virtue].

r_c bounds out of the crowd, mrrp-ing as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/press/presses} {PRONOUN/r_c/self} into m_c's fur. m_c chokes back a startled laugh before returning the affection as r_c offers a life for [virtue].
r_c strides forward, an energy in {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} steps that wasn't present in {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} last moments. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a life for [virtue].
r_c pads forward with a wary expression. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a life for [virtue].
r_c approaches, a warm smile on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} face. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/offer/offers} a life for [virtue], whispering to take care of the Clan the best {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can.
r_c approaches, a blank expression on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} face. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/offer/offers} a life for [virtue], whispering to not lose {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way.

Finally, r_c steps forward. There is pride in {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} gaze as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/stare/stares} into m_c's eyes. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a life for [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

life_giving.text: Finally, r_c steps forward. There is a conflicted expression on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} face when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/step/steps} forward and {VERB/r_c/stare/stares} into m_c's eyes. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a life for [virtue].

virtue: endurance in the face of hardship

the strength to overcome their fears

life_giving.text: r_c, one of StarClan's oldest leaders, looks at the new leader with a conflicted expression. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/give/gives} a last life, the gift of [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

text: r_c hails m_c by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new name, m_c_star, telling {PRONOUN/m_c/object} that {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old life is no more. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/are/is} granted guardianship of c_n, and are told to use {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new power wisely. The group of starry cats yowls m_c_star's name in support. m_c_star wakes up feeling a new strength within {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} body and know that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/are/is} now ready to lead the Clan.
m_c_star wakes, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new name echoing in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ears.

r_c hails m_c by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new name, m_c_star, telling {PRONOUN/m_c/object} that {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old life is no more. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/are/is} granted guardianship of c_n, and are told to use {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new power wisely. StarClan is silent as the new leader begins to wake up. m_c_star stands, feeling a new strength within {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} body, and grins.
